question: The Reserve Bank of India has extended the Interest subvention on MSME loans till which date?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has said that the two per cent interest subvention for micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) on loans offered by co-operative banks has been extended till 31st of March next year.
Fresh/incremental term loan or working capital limit provided by co-operative banks with effect from March 3, 2020, will be eligible for coverage under the scheme. The notification also included certain modifications regarding the credit disbursal and documentation.
